Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.utilities

Class Grids

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.gui.utilities.Grids
public class Grids extends Object
Static class for getting all the required boxes for the game.

    • board

      static javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane board(SchoolBoard schoolBoard, int entranceStudents, BoardContainer boardContainer)
      Method for generating all the required grids for the board.
      Parameters:
      schoolBoard - The SchoolBoard to display.
      entranceStudents - The number of students to display in the entrance.
      boardContainer - The BoardContainer for storing all required information.
      Returns:
      The generated AnchorPane with all the required items.

      playersNumber - The number of players according to which the number of students di display is picked.
      cloudContainer - The CloudContainer for storing all required information.

      The generated GridPane with all the required items.

      Initializes the towers.
      Parameters:
      gridPane - The grid where to put the towers.
      towerType - The color of the towers to display.

      towersToShow - The number of towers to display.
      Returns:
      The generated list of buttons.
